      <p>To th=
ose who were paying attention to the cave there was no sign of<br>
the prot=
ohumans at first. It would seem that they disappeared. However<br>
evidence=
 of their presence could be seen in the wheelbarrel tracks and<br>
foot pri=
nts that led to the back of the cave.<br>
<br>
In the back was another smal=
l door way, hidden behind tree roots that<br>
came from up above and a scra=
ggly brush that managed to grow here.<br>
However both the roots and brush =
looked strange and mishappen. There<br>
is a strange radiation coming from =
the entrance of the cave.<br>
<br>
OOC: Perceptor might recognize the radia=
tion as the type typically<br>
given off  from URANIUM or something very si=
milar. It was something<br>
that can be used for a power source and somethi=
ng normally deadly to<br>
humans . . . and protohumans who are exposed for =
too long.<br>
<br>
(TAG)<br>
<br>
- Preston<br>
